scripts.build: npm run build:habits && npm run build:shop
scripts.build:habits: cd apps/gestion-habitude && npm ci && npm run build && shx rm -rf ../../public/habits && shx mkdir -p ../../public/habits && shx cp -r dist/* ../../public/habits/
scripts.build:shop: cd apps/mini-ecommerce && npm ci && npx nuxi generate && shx rm -rf ../../public/shop && shx mkdir -p ../../public/shop && shx cp -r .output/public/* ../../public/shop/
